paint

void paint(Graphics g,
           int p0,
           int p1,
           Shape bounds,
           CodeEditor c)
Renders the highlight.

Parameters:
g - the graphics context
p0 - the starting offset in the model >= 0
p1 - the ending offset in the model >= p0
bounds - the bounding box for the highlight
c - the editor
